p.codeblock: virtual bool onRemoteAudioSpectrum(const UserAudioSpectrumInfo * spectrums, unsigned int spectrumNumber) = 0;

section.p: After successfully calling to implement the callback in the and calling to enable audio spectrum monitoring, the SDK will trigger the callback as the time interval you set to report the received remote audio data spectrum.

pt.props: cpp unreal bp unity rn electron flutter cs

plentry.pd: The audio spectrum information of the remote user, see . The number of arrays is the number of remote users monitored by the SDK. If the array is null, it means that no audio spectrum of remote users is detected.

plentry.props: android cpp unreal bp unity rn electron flutter cs

section.title: Returns
section.p:
Whether the spectrum data is received:
: Spectrum data is received.
: No spectrum data is received.
